text: Büren can be any of the following places: ==In Germany== *Büren, Westphalia *Büren, Steinfurt, in the municipality of Lotte, Steinfurt *Büren, Hanover, in the municipality of Neustadt, Hannover ==In Switzerland== *Büren, Solothurn, in the Canton of Solothurn *Büren (district), a former district in the Canton of Bern *Büren an der Aare in the canton of Bern *Büren zum Hof, in the canton of Bern ==In Mongolia == *Büren, Töv, a sum in Töv Province ==Other== *Büron, in the canton of Lucerne, Switzerland
title: Büren
